---

I've created a keybindings configuration file that sets up Ctrl+Click for the "Go to Declaration" action. This configuration will:
1. Use `ctrl+click` as the key combination
2. Trigger the `editor.action.goToDeclaration` command
3. Only work when:
   - The editor has a definition provider (language support for go-to-declaration)
   - The editor has text focus
   - You're not in an embedded editor

The changes should take effect immediately. You can now use Ctrl+Click on any symbol to navigate to its declaration. If you need to modify this binding or add other keybindings, just let me know!
